    D

    DbmsType - Enum Class in edu.rit.g2.parser
    Represents the supported Database Management System (DBMS) types that the Schema2Script application can work with.

    E

    edu.rit.g2 - package edu.rit.g2
    Root package for the Schema2Script application.
    edu.rit.g2.controller - package edu.rit.g2.controller
    Contains the controller layer of the Schema2Script application.
    edu.rit.g2.factory - package edu.rit.g2.factory
    Provides factory classes for creating parsers and SQL generators.
    edu.rit.g2.generator - package edu.rit.g2.generator
    Contains SQL generator interfaces and implementations.
    edu.rit.g2.model - package edu.rit.g2.model
    Contains the core data model for the Schema2Script application.
    edu.rit.g2.parser - package edu.rit.g2.parser
    Provides schema parsing logic and related components.
    edu.rit.g2.ui - package edu.rit.g2.ui
    Contains Swing-based user interface components for the Schema2Script application.
    edu.rit.g2.view - package edu.rit.g2.view
    Contains view abstractions and implementations for presenting messages, errors, and SQL output to the user.

    SchemaParser - Interface in edu.rit.g2.parser
    Defines the contract for schema parsers capable of reading external schema files and converting them into a SchemaModel.

    SqlGenerator - Interface in edu.rit.g2.generator
    Defines the contract for components capable of converting a SchemaModel into SQL DDL (Data Definition Language) statements.
